name: INPauseWorkoutIntentHandling
desc: An interface that handles requests to pause a workout.

items.name: func resolveWorkoutName(for: INPauseWorkoutIntent, with: (INSpeakableStringResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the name of the workout that the user wants to pause.

items.name: func confirm(intent: INPauseWorkoutIntent, completion: (INPauseWorkoutIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Confirms that you can pause the current workout.
